events.name: Android Architecture Components

venue.name: Unitec San Pedro Sula
venue.address_1: Boulevard del Norte, desvío a Armenta, contiguo a Altia

events.description:
Join us for the First GDG San Pedro Sula meetup! We will be talking about Android Architecture Components! and the incoming  workshops.

Android Architecture Components, by Oscar Presidente

Did you ever struggle with the Android Activity/Fragment lifecycle? Have you ever had crashes because you rotated the screen, or put the app in the background while performing a network request? Do you need a Database in your app, but don't want to deal with the pain of using SQLite?

Then this talk is for you! At I/O, Google introduced a set of libraries that are here to help make development for Android easier on all of these things!

Schedule

=====================================

7:00 - Networking 

7:30 - Juguitos Break - GDG Presentation

8:00 - Android Architecture Components

events.name: Angular Cafe
events.description:
A call to all the web developers of San Pedro Sula, Cortés.

This is the first edition of "Angular Café" a meeting with the objective to speak specifically about Angular, in the first part, mainly about this topics:

1. What is Angular?

2. What can we do with Angular

3. How do I start to develop in Angular?

If you have never developed with Angular and you want to know what it is about, you are more than welcome.

We are waiting for you this November 30 in Cafeteo in front of the Saybe Theater at 5:30 pm,

Do not miss it!

events.name: Making Android Apps with Kotlin
events.description:
• What we'll do
Android Development with Kotlin is a meetup for those who want to develop Android using and discovering Kotlin. The main objective of this meetup is to cover all the topics of mobile development in Android but with the new advantages and novelties that Kotlin presents, the new language approved by Google that is presented as an alternative to Java.
Come join us and learn more about this neat language, the ecosystem surrounding it and what Kotlin can do for you!

• What to bring
Laptop

• Important to know

events.name: Javascript Essentials
events.description:
• What we'll do
Join us to learn JavaScript basics that will show you as a complete beginner how to begin creating programs using JavaScript.

• What to bring
Laptop

• Important to know
workshop

events.name: Kotlin 4 Android Developers
events.description: Meetup goal is to learn and share our knowledge about the Kotlin programming language using on Android

events.name: Flutter - Nueva forma de crear Mobile Apps
events.description:
¿Estás interesado en aprender más sobre Flutter, el nuevo framework de aplicaciones móviles para ayudar a los desarrolladores y diseñadores a crear aplicaciones móviles modernas tanto para iOS como para Android?

Si estás interesado en aprender sobre Flutter, ven a este meetup. Realizaremos una introducción práctica a Flutter mediante el desarrollo de una app de ejemplo.

Nos vemos el 20 de Septiembre en las oficinas de Beehive!

Espacios limitados disponibles: si no puede venir, actualiza tu RSVP para permitir que otros asistan.

Flutter - A New Way to Build Mobile Apps Are you interested in learning more about Flutter, the new mobile app SDK to help developers and designers build modern mobile apps for both iOS and Android?

If you're interested in learning more about Flutter come to this meetup. We'll run a hands-on introduction to Flutter by developing an example. See you on Sept 20 at the Beehive offices!

Limited spaces available - If you cannot make it please update your RSVP to allow for others to attend.

events.name: Una rápida introducción a Google Cloud Platform
events.description: En este taller haremos una rápida introducción a GCP. En él veremos sus aspectos básicos, y una breve introduccion a su estructura y diferentes servicios. Además, podremos ver en acción uno de los servicios configurando un servicio en el Google App Engine. utilizando la Cloud Shell, la terminal remota que nos permite administrar y desplegar todos nuestros servicios y apps en GCP sin salir del navegador.

events.name: Introducción a la  Arquitectura Serverless  con Google Cloud Platform.
events.description: La arquitectura sin servidor es un nuevo paradigma informático que abstrae por completo la complejidad que suele ir asociada con la administración de servidores para backends de dispositivos móviles y de APIs, ETL, tareas de tratamiento de datos, bases de datos y mucho más.
